transliteration: Gadan Jooh Saaje|| Bhire Ros Baaje||36||
translation: The group of elephants are adorned and the warriors are fighting with increased anger. 36.
The sharp swords glisten like the flash of lightning in the clouds.

transliteration: Bade Baar Bairoo|| Jalan Jayo Gadgadroo||37||
translation: The blows are struck on the enemy like the swift-moving water-insect.37.

transliteration: Apo Aap Baahan|| Oubhai Jeet Chaahan||
translation: They strike weapons confronting each other; both sides wish for their victory.

transliteration: Rasan Rudra Raate|| Mahaan Matt Maate||38||
translation: They are absorbed in violent rage and are highly intoxicated.38.

gurmukhi: mcy bIr bIrM ABUqM BXwxM ]bjI Byr BuMkwr Du`ky inswxM ]
transliteration: Mache Boor Booran Abhootan Bhayaanan|| Badoo Bhet Bhounkaar Dhoukke Nisaanan||
translation: The warriors fighting with warriors are looking wonderfully frightening. The clattering sound of kettledrums is heard and there is also the thunder of trumpets.

gurmukhi: nvM n`d nIswx g`jy ghIrM ]iPrY ruMf muMfM qnM q`C qIrM ]39]
transliteration: Navan Nadd Noosaan Gadje Gadooran|| Phirai Round Mounndan Tanan Tachchh Toorant||39||
translation: The serious tone of the new trumpets resounds. Somewhere the trunks, somewhere the heads, somewhere the bodies hewed by arrows are seen moving.39.

gurmukhi: bhy K`g KyqM iKAwlM KqMgM ]ruly q`C mu`CM mhw joD jMgM ]
transliteration: Bade Khagg Khetan Khiaalan Khatanadg|| Rule Tachchh Mouchchhan Mahaa Jodh Janadg||
translation: The warriors strike their swords and care for their arrows in the battlefield. The great heroes, chopped in the war are rolling in dust.

gurmukhi: bMDy bIr bwnw bfy AYiT vwry ]GumY loh Gu`tM mno mqvwry ]40]
transliteration: Bandhe Boor Baanaa Bade Aith(i) Vdare|| Ghoumai Loh Ghouttan Mano Matvdare||40||
translation: The greatly proud warriors, having tied their quivers and equipped with armour move in the battlefield like the drunkards.40.

gurmukhi: auTI kUh jUhM smr swr b`ijXM ]ikDo AMq ky kwl ko myG g`ijXM ]
transliteration: Outhoo Kooh Joohan Samara Saar Bajjiyan|| Kidho Ant Ke Kaal Ko Megh Gadjiyan||
translation: The weapons were struck and there was confusion all around, it seemed that the clouds of doomsday were thundering.

gurmukhi: BeI qIr BIrM kmwxM kV`ikXM ]bjy loh kRohM mhwN jMg m`icXM ]41]
transliteration: Bhaoo Toor Bhooran Kamaanan Kadakkiyan|| Bade Loh Krohan Mahaan Jan Machchiyan||41||
translation: Hearing the cracking sound bows, the warriors of great endurance are becoming cowards. The steel clatters in rage with steel nad the great war is in progress.41.

gurmukhi: ibr`cy mhwN jMg joDw juAwxM ]Kuly K`g KqRI ABUqM BXwxM ]
transliteration: Birachche Mahaan Jan Jodhaa Juaanan|| Khule Khagg Khatroo Abhootan Bhayaanan||
translation: The youthful warriors are moving in this great war, with naked swords the fighters look wonderfully terrible.

gurmukhi: blI ju`J ru`JY rsM rudR r`qy ]imly h`Q b`KM mhw qyj q`qy ]42]
transliteration: Badoo Jujjh Rujjhai Rasan Rudra Ratte|| Mile Hatth Bakkhanndmahaa Tej Tatte||42||
translation: Adsorbed in violent rage, the brave warriors are engaged in war. The heroes with utmost enthusiasm are catching hold the waists of opponents in order to throw them down.42.
